item.title: King and Queen meet Holocaust survivors at Palace
item.description: King Charles III hosted the reception to mark Holocaust Memorial Day with survivors honoured in a series of specially commissioned portraits.

item.title: Hadjar crashes new Red Bull in F1 testing
item.description: Newly promoted Red Bull driver Isack Hadjar crashes his car in wet conditions on the second day of Formula 1 pre-season testing.

item.title: 'We all know someone who was killed' - Iran protesters tell BBC of brutal crackdown
item.description: Young Iranians able tell the BBC how they saw friends and other people die as security forces crushed protests earlier this month.

item.title: Koepka 'rang Woods first' over PGA Tour return
item.description: Five-time major winner Brooks Koepka says Tiger Woods was the first person he called to discuss a return to the PGA Tour after leaving the LIV Golf ci...

item.title: British Army officer dies after incident during live fire training
item.description: The 25-year-old died on Sunday after the incident at an army training site in Northumberland.
